ingredients.ingredient: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle root beer
1 (4 fluid ounce) bottle liquid smoke flavoring

cookingTips: Rub coarse salt directly onto roast 30 minutes before cooking for better flavor penetration
Use liquid smoke sparingly and taste as you go to avoid overpowering the dish
Cook on low for 8-10 hours until roast falls apart easily
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create distinctive pulled pork using root beer sweetness and liquid smoke for layered, smoky depth.
